entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
